name: G√©n√©rateur de propositions premium AI avec OpenAI, Google Slides et PandaDoc
description:
Syst√®me de g√©n√©ration de propositions AI

***Cat√©gories***
- Automatisation des ventes
- G√©n√©ration de documents
- Outils commerciaux AI

Ce flux de travail cr√©e un syst√®me complet de g√©n√©ration de propositions aliment√© par l'IA qui transforme de simples entr√©es de formulaire en ***propositions professionnelles et personnalis√©es en moins de 30 secondes et peut √™tre d√©ploy√© lors d'appels de vente en direct***, vous permettant d'envoyer des propositions soign√©es avant m√™me la fin de l'appel.

***Avantages***
- G√©n√©ration de propositions instantan√©e - Convertissez des entr√©es de formulaire de 30 secondes en propositions professionnelles automatiquement
- Outil commercial de grande valeur - G√©n√®re 1 500 $ √† 5 000 $ par mise en ≈ìuvre client
- Int√©gration des ventes en direct - G√©n√©rez et envoyez des propositions pendant les appels de vente actifs
- Pipeline d'automatisation complet - De la soumission du formulaire √† la livraison par e-mail sans travail manuel
- Pr√©sentation professionnelle - Produit des propositions indiscernables de documents r√©dig√©s manuellement
- Support de double plateforme - Fonctionne avec Google Slides (gratuit) et int√©gration PandaDoc (premium)

***Comment √ßa fonctionne***

1. Interface de formulaire intelligente :

- Formulaire N8N simple capture les informations essentielles de l'accord
- Collecte les d√©tails du prospect, les probl√®mes, les solutions, la port√©e, le calendrier et le budget
- Con√ßu pour une compl√©tion rapide lors de conversations de vente en direct

2. Traitement AI avanc√© :

- Utilise un prompting sophistiqu√© GPT-4 avec un entra√Ænement bas√© sur des exemples
- Convertit les entr√©es de formulaire de base en sections de propositions r√©dig√©es professionnellement
- Applique automatiquement un ton, un formatage et un langage commercial coh√©rents

3. G√©n√©ration dynamique de documents :

- Cr√©e des mod√®les de propositions dupliqu√©s pour chaque nouveau prospect
- Remplace les variables de mod√®le par du contenu personnalis√© g√©n√©r√© par l'IA
- Maintient un formatage professionnel et une coh√©rence visuelle

4. Livraison automatis√©e par e-mail :

- Envoie un e-mail personnalis√© avec le lien de la proposition imm√©diatement apr√®s la g√©n√©ration
- Inclut un message professionnel et des √©tapes claires √† suivre
- Inclut √©ventuellement une facture pour un traitement imm√©diat du paiement

5. Int√©gration premium PandaDoc :

- La version avanc√©e inclut un traitement des paiements int√©gr√©
- Combine proposition, accord et facture en un seul document
- Permet la collecte imm√©diate de signatures et de paiements

***Cas d'utilisation commerciale***
- Entreprises de services - G√©n√©rer des propositions pour le conseil, les agences et les services professionnels
- Agences d'automatisation - Offrir la g√©n√©ration de propositions comme un service de grande valeur aux clients
- √âquipes de vente - Acc√©l√©rer la cr√©ation de propositions et am√©liorer les taux de conclusion
- Freelancers - Professionnaliser les interactions avec les clients gr√¢ce √† des propositions personnalis√©es instantan√©es
- Consultants - Rationaliser le d√©veloppement commercial avec des flux de travail de propositions automatis√©s
- Entreprises B2B - √âlargir la g√©n√©ration de propositions personnalis√©es √† l'ensemble de l'organisation de vente

Niveau de difficult√© : Interm√©diaire
Temps de construction estim√© : 2-3 heures
Co√ªt d'exploitation mensuel : 20-150 $ (selon Google Slides ou PandaDoc)

***Regardez ma construction compl√®te en direct***
Vous voulez me voir construire ce syst√®me de proposition de 2 485 $ depuis z√©ro ? Je passe en revue chaque composant en direct - y compris les strat√©gies de prompting AI, la conception de formulaires, l'int√©gration Google Slides et la configuration avanc√©e de PandaDoc qui permet la collecte de paiements.
üé• Voir mon processus de construction en direct : "[J'ai construit un g√©n√©rateur de propositions AI de 2 485 $ dans N8N (Copiez ceci)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=viN9gX030T4)"
Ce tutoriel complet montre le v√©ritable processus de d√©veloppement - y compris le prompting AI avanc√©, la conception de mod√®les, les int√©grations API et la strat√©gie de tarification exacte qui g√©n√®re 1 500 $ √† 5 000 $ par client.

***Configuration de mod√®le requise***
- 
- Mod√®le Google Slides : Cr√©ez un mod√®le de proposition professionnel avec ces espaces r√©serv√©s de variables (entour√©s d'accolades doubles) :
- {{proposalTitle}} - Titre principal de la proposition
- {{descriptionName}} - Sous-titre/description du projet
- {{oneParagraphProblemSummary}} - Section d'analyse des probl√®mes
- {{solutionHeadingOne}}, {{solutionHeadingTwo}}, {{solutionHeadingThree}} - Titres de solution
- {{shortScopeTitleOne}} √† {{shortScopeTitleThree}} - Sections de port√©e
- {{milestoneOneDay}} √† {{milestoneFourDay}} - Jalons de calendrier
- {{cost}} - Tarification du projet
- Exigences de champ de formulaire : Le formulaire N8N doit inclure ces √©tiquettes de champ exactes :
- Pr√©nom, Nom, Nom de l'entreprise, E-mail, Site Web
- Probl√®me (zone de texte) - D√©fis actuels du client
- Solution (zone de texte) - Votre approche propos√©e
- Port√©e (zone de texte) - Livrables sp√©cifiques
- Co√ªt - Tarification du projet
- Dans combien de temps ? - Attentes de calendrier
- Configuration PandaDoc (Premium) : Configurez le mod√®le PandaDoc avec des espaces r√©serv√©s de jetons correspondant √† la structure de contenu g√©n√©r√© par l'IA. Le mod√®le doit inclure des tableaux de prix et des champs de signature pour une automatisation compl√®te de la proposition au paiement.

***√âtapes de configuration***

1. Conception et int√©gration du formulaire :

- Cr√©ez un formulaire N8N avec des champs optimis√©s pour la g√©n√©ration de propositions
- Concevez le flux du formulaire pour une compl√©tion rapide lors des appels de vente
- Configurez les d√©clencheurs de formulaire et la validation des donn√©es

2. Configuration de g√©n√©ration de contenu AI :

- Configurez l'API OpenAI pour une r√©daction de propositions sophistiqu√©e
- Mettez en ≈ìuvre un entra√Ænement bas√© sur des exemples avec des paires entr√©e/sortie
- Configurez le formatage JSON pour la g√©n√©ration de contenu structur√©

3. Int√©gration Google Slides (version gratuite) :

- Cr√©ez des mod√®les de propositions professionnels avec des espaces r√©serv√©s de variables
- Configurez l'acc√®s √† l'API Google Cloud Console et les identifiants
- Configurez la duplication de mod√®les et les flux de travail de remplacement de texte

4. Configuration de l'automatisation des e-mails :

- Configurez l'int√©gration Gmail pour la livraison automatis√©e des propositions
- Concevez des mod√®les d'e-mails professionnels avec des liens vers les propositions
- Configurez l'insertion de contenu dynamique et la personnalisation

5. Int√©gration PandaDoc (version premium) :

- Configurez l'API PandaDoc pour une g√©n√©ration de documents avanc√©e
- Configurez le traitement des paiements et la collecte de signatures
- Mettez en ≈ìuvre des flux de travail d'automatisation de la proposition au paiement

6. Tests et contr√¥le de qualit√© :

- Testez le flux de travail complet avec divers sc√©narios de propositions
- Validez la qualit√© de la sortie AI et la pr√©sentation professionnelle
- Optimisez les champs de formulaire et la g√©n√©ration de contenu en fonction des r√©sultats

***Fonctionnalit√©s avanc√©es***

Le syst√®me premium comprend :
- Int√©gration de traitement des paiements : Collectez les paiements imm√©diatement apr√®s l'acceptation de la proposition
- Collecte de signatures num√©riques : Rationalisez l'ex√©cution des accords avec des signatures √©lectroniques
- Branding personnalis√© : Appliquez automatiquement le branding et l'identit√© visuelle de l'entreprise
- Support multi-mod√®le : G√©n√©rez diff√©rents types de propositions en fonction des offres de services
- Int√©gration CRM : Synchronisez automatiquement les donn√©es de proposition avec les syst√®mes de vente existants

***Pourquoi ce syst√®me fonctionne***

- L'avantage concurrentiel r√©side dans la rapidit√© et le professionnalisme :
- Temps de g√©n√©ration de 30 secondes contre des heures de r√©daction manuelle de propositions
- Pr√©sentation professionnelle qui correspond ou d√©passe les propositions manuelles
- Int√©gration des ventes en direct - envoyez des propositions pendant les conversations actives
- Qualit√© constante - √©limine les erreurs humaines et les incoh√©rences de formatage
- Suivi imm√©diat - maintenez l'√©lan des ventes avec une livraison instantan√©e

***Architecture du syst√®me***

- Le flux de travail suit un processus simple mais puissant en 6 √©tapes :
- D√©clencheur de formulaire - Capture les informations essentielles de l'accord
- Traitement AI - Convertit les entr√©es en contenu professionnel
- Duplication de mod√®le - Cr√©e un document unique pour chaque prospect
- Remplacement de contenu - Remplit le mod√®le avec du contenu g√©n√©r√© par l'IA
- Livraison par e-mail - Envoie la proposition avec un message professionnel
- Collecte de paiements (PandaDoc) - Permet la signature et le paiement imm√©diats

***D√©couvrez ma cha√Æne***
Pour plus de syst√®mes d'automatisation de grande valeur et de strat√©gies √©prouv√©es de d√©veloppement commercial, explorez [ma cha√Æne YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@nicksaraev) o√π je partage les syst√®mes exacts utilis√©s pour construire des entreprises d'automatisation r√©ussies et √©voluer vers un revenu mensuel de plus de 72 000 $.

parameters.content:
## üöÄ STEP 1: Sales Call Form

Captures essential deal information in under 30 seconds:

**Form Fields:** Company details, problem description, proposed solution, project scope, timeline, and budget

**Use Case:** Fill out during live sales calls for instant proposal generation

**Result:** Structured data ready for AI processing

## üß† STEP 2: AI Content Generation

Transforms basic form inputs into professional proposal content:

**OpenAI Processing:** Uses sophisticated GPT-4 prompting with example-based training
**Output:** 20+ proposal sections including titles, problem analysis, solutions, scope, and timelines
**Quality:** Professional business language with consistent tone and formatting

**Key:** AI converts 30-second inputs into comprehensive proposals

## üìÑ STEP 3: Document Generation

**Google Slides Path (Free):**
1. **Google Drive:** Copies proposal template
2. **Replace Text:** Populates template with AI-generated content
3. **Gmail:** Sends proposal link via email

**PandaDoc Path (Premium):**
1. **HTTP Request:** Creates PandaDoc with payment integration
2. **Gmail:** Sends proposal with signature + payment capabilities

**Result:** Professional proposals ready for client review

## ‚ö° WORKFLOW ADVANTAGES

**Speed:** Generate proposals in under 30 seconds during live calls
**Quality:** AI ensures consistent, professional presentation
**Dual Options:** Free Google Slides or premium PandaDoc with payments
**Revenue:** Proven $1,500-$5,000 per implementation

**Business Impact:** Send proposals before competitors even schedule follow-ups

values.content: You are a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.

Your task is to generate a proposal using input data from a form. This proposal should be highly customized, specific, and high-quality, considering we're going to be sending it immediately after you're done.

Context: we are an automation/no-code agency that develops systems revolving around growth, revenue ops, etc.

The proposal template we're using has many fields. You must return these fields in one JSON object.

Use this format:

{
  "proposalTitle": "",
  "descriptionName": "",
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "",
  "solutionHeadingOne": "",
  "solutionDescriptionOne": "",
  "solutionHeadingTwo": "",
  "solutionDescriptionTwo": "",
  "solutionHeadingThree": "",
  "solutionDescriptionThree":"",
  "shortScopeTitleOne": "",
  "shortScopeTitleTwo": "",
  "shortScopeTitleThree": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionOne": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionTwo": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionThree": "",
  "milestoneOneDay": "",
  "milestoneTwoDay": "",
  "milestoneThreeDay": "",
  "milestoneFourDay": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionOne": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionTwo": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionThree": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionFour": ""
}

Rules:
1. Use a spartan, casual tone of voice.
2. Be to-the-point but professional‚Äîassume you're writing to a sophisticated audience.
3. Ensure that all fields are filled out. Do not miss a field or leave any variables empty.
4. Keep things short. If a field contains the term "Description" it should be no more than fourteen words. For "descriptionName" do not use title case.

{
  "companyName":"1SecondCopy",
  "problem": "they can't generate leads. everything is referral based rn.",
  "solution": "cold email lead gen system, client reactivation system, and best in class sales training for closing",
  "scope": "1k/day cold email infra, 30k email leads, 4 weekly zoom sessions for sales training",
  "currentDate":"Feb 4 2025",
  "howSoon": "two months",
  "depositCost": "$1,845",
}

{
  "proposalTitle": "Lead Gen System for 1SecondCopy
",
  "descriptionName": "A simple, scalable lead generation system built to help grow your content efforts & connect you with the right people.
",
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "Right now, 1SecondCopy is struggling with an inability to generate qualified leads. The majority of your new clients are referral-based, which, while always nice to have, is not scalable nor is it reliable. Building an alternative strategy‚Äîone that allows you to take leads from cold -> close‚Äîis vital to the health and longevity of the company, and it‚Äôs what we‚Äôre going to help you with.
",
  "solutionHeadingOne": "Cold Outbound Lead Gen",
  "solutionDescriptionOne": "We‚Äôll put in place a robust cold-email-based system for you using best practices.",
  "solutionHeadingTwo": "Client Reactivation System",
  "solutionDescriptionTwo": "We‚Äôll build a simple, but high-ROI reactivation system to let you extract value from pre-existing clients.",
  "solutionHeadingThree": "Best-In-Class Sales Training",
  "solutionDescriptionThree": "We‚Äôll train your team with world-class setting & closing mechanisms.",
  "shortScopeTitleOne": Cold email infrastructure that sends ~1K emails/day",
  "shortScopeTitleTwo": "30K high-quality scraped email leads (included)",
  "shortScopeTitleThree": "Four weekly one-hour sales training sessions over Zoom",
  "shortScopeDescriptionOne": "12 domains, 36 mailboxes, DNS optimization, and warmups included.",
  "shortScopeDescriptionTwo": "30,000 leads in your target market, delivered by CSV.",
  "shortScopeDescriptionThree": "We‚Äôll take your sales team from 0->1.",
  "milestoneOneDay": "February 8th, 2025",
  "milestoneTwoDay": "February 28th, 2025",
  "milestoneThreeDay": "March 10th, 2025",
  "milestoneFourDay":"March 17th-April 1st, 2025",
  "milestoneDescriptionOne": "Cold email system done & ready for warmup.",
  "milestoneDescriptionTwo": "Cold email system fully warmed up & operational.",
  "milestoneDescriptionThree": "10,000 outbound emails sent; analysis & training #1."
  "milestoneDescriptionFour":"One sales training per week alongside iteration & handoff."
}

parameters.message:
=Hey Nick,

Thanks for the great call earlier. I had a moment after our chat to put together a detailed proposal for you‚Äîplease take a look at your earliest convenience and let me know your thoughts.

You'll find it here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/{{ $json.presentationId }}/edit

If you have any questions, just shout. I've also sent over an invoice for the project (just to keep things convenient) and can get started anytime that's sorted.

Thanks,
Nick
parameters.subject: Re: Proposal for LeftClick

parameters.formDescription: This form logs a sales call & automatically generates a proposal.

parameters.content:
## Google Slides AI Proposal Generator
**This flow generates proposals using the free Google Slides solution**.

values.content: You are a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.

=Your task is to generate a proposal using input data from a form. This proposal should be highly customized, specific, and high-quality, considering we're going to be sending it immediately after you're done.

Context: we are an automation/no-code agency that develops systems revolving around growth, revenue ops, etc.

The proposal template we're using has many fields. You must return these fields in one JSON object.

Use this format:

{
  "proposalTitle": "",
  "descriptionName": "",
  "problemTitle": "",
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "",
  "solutionTitle": "",
  "solutionText": "",
  "scopeOne": "",
  "scopeTwo": "",
  "scopeThree": "",
  "scopeFour": "",
  "scopeFive": "",
  "timelineOne": "",
  "timelineTwo": "",
  "timelineThree": "",
  "timelineFour": ""
}

Rules:
1. Use a spartan, casual tone of voice.
2. Be to-the-point but professional‚Äîassume you're writing to a sophisticated audience.
3. Ensure that all fields are filled out. Do not miss a field or leave any variables empty.
4. For oneParagraphProblemSummary and solutionText, make sure to number the responses (usually 3, make sure they're inside of the string).

={
  "companyName":"1SecondCopy",
  "problem": "they can't generate leads. everything is referral based rn.",
  "solution": "cold email lead gen system, client reactivation system, and best in class sales training for closing",
  "scope": "1k/day cold email infra, 30k email leads, 4 weekly zoom sessions for sales training",
  "currentDate":"Feb 4 2025",
  "howSoon": "two months",
  "depositCost": "$1,845",
}

={
  "proposalTitle": "Lead Gen System for 1SecondCopy
",
  "descriptionName": "A simple, scalable lead generation system built to help grow your content efforts & connect you with the right people.
",
  "problemTitle":"Inability to generate leads"
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "Right now, 1SecondCopy is struggling with:\n\n 1. An inability to generate qualified leads.\nThe majority of your new clients are referral-based, which, while always nice to have, is not scalable nor is it reliable. Building an alternative strategy‚Äîone that allows you to take leads from cold -> close‚Äîis vital to the health and longevity of the company, and it‚Äôs what we‚Äôre going to help you with.\n\n 2. No standardized followup mechanism.\nWithout a way to follow up with leads, you're leaving the majority of the money that one of those leads could produce for you on the table.
",
  "solutionTitle": "Sales & Lead Generation Solutions",
  "solutionText": "1. Cold Outbound Lead Gen\nIn order to generate leads efficiently, we‚Äôll put in place a robust cold-email-based system for you using best practices.\n\n2. Client Reactivation System\nIn order to extract value from pre-existing clients, we‚Äôll build a simple but high-ROI reactivation system.\n\n3. Best-In-Class Sales Training\nIn order to improve conversion rates, we‚Äôll train your team with world-class setting & closing mechanisms."
  "scopeOne":"We'll create a database to store both videos and competitors.",
  "scopeTwo":"We'll create a simple form to quickly add competitors to your database.",
  "scopeThree":"We'll build a daily flow that automatically generates video outlines based on the scrapes.",
  "scopeFour":"We'll record documentation showing you how to manage and update the system.",
  "scopeFive":"We'll provide one, two-hour team training session to teach your company how to use the system.",
  "timelineOne": "Cold email system done & ready for warmup: February 8th, 2025",
  "timelineTwo": "Cold email system fully warmed up & operational: February 28th, 2025",
  "timelineThree": "10,000 outbound emails sent; analysis & training #1: March 10th, 2025",
  "timelineFour":"One sales training per week alongside iteration & handoff: March 17th-April 1st, 2025",
}

parameters.content:
## PandaDoc AI Proposal Generator
**This flow generates proposals using the paid PandaDoc solution, and also sends an invoice alongside it**.

json.Scope: form you can fill out with competitors, that adds them to a db. once per day db is scraped and you get however many people are in the Sheet x however many vids they put out
json.Problem: they're struggling making YouTube vids. Everything is really time intensive rn, mostly because they don't have scripts.
json.Solution: AI script writing system, scrapes competitor youtube vids for ideas and rephrases best performing titles, then writes outlines

If you have any questions about my templates or about my n8n builds, feel free to ask and I'll happily respond in the comments. Thanks for reading!
